messages.title: WORKING FOR CHANGE IN SWANSEA EAST
messages.content: Christian was born at Morriston Hospital in 1980 and lived in Llansamlet for most of his life. He was educated at Birchgrove Comprehensive School, Swansea College and Swansea University. Like you, he is angry at Labour's failures in Swansea East after 13 years in power. It's time for a change. LET'S GET ON WITH IT.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting New Businesses through the Downturn
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Any new business started in the first two years of a Conservative Government will pay no Employer National Insurance on the first ten employees it hires during its first year.
Christian will ensure that the frontline services in Swansea East on which we all depend are protected during the economic downturn created by Labour.
Christian will work with local police and voluntary groups to tackle anti-social behaviour in Swansea East and promote law and order throughout the Constituency.

leaflet.personalStatement: Christian was born at Morriston Hospital in 1980 and lived in Llansamlet for most of his life. He was educated at Birchgrove Comprehensive School, Swansea College and Swansea University.

contactInformation.address: Swansea Conservatives, 31 Maes Lan, Llansamlet, Swansea, SA7 9XJ

images.caption: ABOVE: STANDING UP FOR CONSUMERS' RIGHTS
RIGHT: MAINTAINING LAW AND ORDER IN SWANSEA EAST
